name: How to Fool a Liar King - Theme Song
detailed_description:
Theme song of the game "How to Fool a Liar King". All music files are in mp3 format, 320kbps.

Tracks

1. "Usotsuki na Ousama" performed by inatsuri

2. Usotsuki na Ousama (Karaoke ver.)
3. Usotsuki na Ousama (Short ver.)

Files

1. Lyrics+Translation (pdf)

2. Readme

DLC Save Folder

You can find the files by right clicking the game title at the right side, and choosing the game properties > local files> Shows local files > find a folder called "themesong" inside.
